Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipeline.aggregate(String, Class<U>, AggregationOptions, ReadPreference)
    use AggregationPipeline.out(String, Class, AggregationOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipeline.aggregate(String, Class<U>, ReadPreference)
    use AggregationPipeline.out(String, Class) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.asList()
    This method is being renamed to make more consistent, symmetric API. Use Query.list() instead.
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.asList(FindOptions)
    This method is being renamed to make more consistent, symmetric API. Use Query.list(FindOptions) instead.
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.get()
    This method is being renamed to make more consistent, symmetric API. Use MongoIterable.first() instead.
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.get(Class<T>, List<V>)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.get(FindOptions)
    This method is being renamed to make more consistent, symmetric API. Use Query.first(FindOptions) instead.
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.get(T)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getByKey(Class<T>, Key<T>)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getCount(Class<T>)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getCount(Query<T>)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getCount(Query<T>, CountOptions)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.getCount(String)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getCount(T)
    Inline this method to update to the new usage
    xyz.morphia.EntityInterceptor.preSave(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.prePersist(Object, Document, Mapper) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.where(CodeWScope)
    use #where(CodeWithScope) instead
